trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around June 9th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsFor the past week I've noticed several bright lights in the sky over west Houston that at first glance resemble very bright stars, however, they change color very rapidly - white, red, orange, blue. The objects also move in a zig zag fashion, as well as, up and down. I was wondering if anyone has seen something similar in west Houston recently?
